layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (0,0) size 800x600
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 666.66x500 [bgcolor=#008000]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 3x15
          text run at (0,0) width 3: " "
